description.title: Your Amharic Seventh-day Adventist Hymnal
description.text: Mesgana is a digital hymnal for Amharic-speaking Seventh-day Adventist communities worldwide. Whether you're leading Sabbath services or participating in worship, Mesgana brings the worship experience directly to your device.

download.title: Join the Amharic SDA Community
download.subtitle: Download Mesgana and help us build a better worship experience.

hymns.title: Amharic SDA Hymns
hymns.description: Complete collection of traditional Ethiopian Seventh-day Adventist hymns in their original Amharic language.

bilingual.title: SDA Bilingual Worship
bilingual.description: Seamlessly switch between Amharic and English for multilingual SDA congregations, making worship accessible to all members of your church family.

sabbath.title: Sabbath-Ready
sabbath.description: Perfect for Sabbath services, prayer meetings, and personal devotion. Build your favorites list for quick access during worship and study.

offline.title: Always Available
offline.description: Complete offline access ensures your Amharic SDA hymnal is always available, whether you're in church, at home, or traveling for ministry.
